EmailTemplate.name: MBO Partners - Best of luck finding your contract (1311691298.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: MBO Partners - Best of luck finding your contract (1311691298.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
110 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Christian,
It was a pleasure speaking with you today. I’ve enclosed a few resources that you might find helpful:
· This interactive tool shows the value of using a company like MBO as an alternative to incorporation: http://www.mbopartners.com/#whoweare · You can browse through the group benefits you would have access to here: http://www.mbopartners.com/mbo-exec-group-benefits · There are some webinars and videos we have created that might assist you in finding your next contract: http://www.mbopartners.com/mbo-partners-webcast-index
As I mentioned once you find your next contract we can do a financial illustration showing what that income would look like being run through MBO Partners. Best of luck finding your next contract and I’ll follow up with you as promised.
If you have questions before then, feel free to schedule a convenient time for you on my online schedule: https://my.timedriver.com/C9CPC.
Regards,
Steve
Steven Arhancet Director of Associate Enrollment and Market Development O:703.793.6011 | M:540.560.8837 | F:703.793.6081 13454 Sunrise Valley Drive #300 Herndon, VA 20171 sarhancet@mbopartners.com www.mbopartners.com
